titleStmt.title: Votes of the House of Representatives for His Majesties province of New-York in America
Proceedings. 1698-05.
titleStmt.author: New York (State). General Assembly.

notesStmt.note: Copy imperfect; lacking all after p. 4, which ends: "Stephen Cortlands house at".
Filmed following verso of "A true account of the signing of the peace on Friday the 20th of September, 1697. London : printed for Tho. Swift, 1697. Text read as print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
